line.originaltext: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling
1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg
1 teaspoon lemon zest
1 egg
1/3 cup white sugar
1 tablespoon lemon juice
3 ounces cream cheese
1/4 cup sour cream
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).
Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator.
Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator.
Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator.
Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator.
Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust.
Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust.
Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust.
line.annotation: separate(ing70, ing71, "one rolled pastry crust", ing72, "another rolled pastry crust", "")

line.originaltext: Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust.
In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind.
In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind.
Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan.
Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan.
Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan.
In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream.
In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream.
line.annotation: combine({ing65, ing66, ing67, ing68, ing69}, ing75, "egg mixture", "")

line.originaltext: Beat at medium speed until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing75, t14, ing76, "egg mixture", "beat at medium speed")

line.originaltext: Beat at medium speed until smooth.
Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling.
line.annotation: combine({ing74, ing76}, ing77, "all filling", "pour cheese mixture over apple mixture")

line.originaltext: Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling.
line.annotation: combine({ing72, ing77}, ing78, "pie", "place rolled pastry on top")

line.originaltext: Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar.
Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar.
line.annotation: cut(ing78, t15, ing79, "pie with vents", "steam vents")

line.originaltext: Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar.
Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar.
line.annotation: combine({ing79, ing80}, ing81, "pie", "sprinkle top with sugar")

line.originaltext: Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown.
Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown.
Cool completely before serving.
Cool completely before serving.
